name: The CAICA Generator
description:
Ever wanted your own robotic companion? Well, we here at Orchid Mist are here to provide just that! Using our interactive program you can create a CAICA (Cybernetic Artificially Intelligent Companion Animal) of your own! We also provide information on our organization, as well as our lovely mascots!

This is a small project I decided to create to get better at using Python. It's not much, but I hope you enjoy it, and feel free to share your thoughts below!
